title: Waters Delivers Statement at First Conference Committee Meeting on the America COMPETES Act

title: Waters Secures House Passage of Nine Bipartisan Financial Services Bills
summary: Today, Chairwoman Maxine Waters secured passage by the U.S. House of Representatives of nine bipartisan bills The Fair Hiring in Banking Act (H.R. 5911), a bill by Representative Joyce Beatty (D-OH). This bill would expand employment opportunities at banks and credit unions by reducing barriers to employment based on past minor criminal offenses.
